message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its worth to me and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $100. This price reflects the value I place on the product and provides an opportunity for you to acquire it at a reasonable premium compared to its worth to you. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, considering my budget and the worth of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $90. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product. This price still allows me to cover my expectations while providing you with a fair deal. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.

I appreciate your effort in adjusting your offer, Alice. After considering your proposal, I believe a price of $90 would be more suitable for me. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
